caption.title: Learning curves for atomization energies (AE).
caption.p:
a Mean absolute error (MAE) of AE predictions on the test set, as a function of the number of training molecules n train. The training sets were constructed using FPS with the extensive ( a) and intensive kernels ( b) (see text). c AE learning curves using molecular geometries obtained with the universal forcefield (UFF). The gray line represents a learning rate of

and serves as a guide to the eye in all three panels.
